title: Barrie Schwortz: Science is simply man’s attempt to understand God’s creation
post: Personally, I would say this :  science is simply man’s attempt to EXPLAIN how God’s creation works (the question is “how”) while religion is simply man’s attempt to EXPLAIN the profound meaning of God’s creation (the question is “why”).  Both are truly important but should not never be mixed together because both are not located on the same level and are not trying to answer the same question.
author: Yannick Clément
